sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_cd01adbb9fd432107f440f42b824ab58
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Record operations: update delivery after decision</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"The Delivery Delay “Route ID” to update"},{"name":"chosen_option_json","description":"JSON string of the chosen option (stringified object)"},{"name":"status","description":"status of record"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Record operations: update delivery after decision</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:57:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>cd01adbb9fd432107f440f42b824ab58</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record operations: update delivery after decision</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_cd01adbb9fd432107f440f42b824ab58</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 08:07:32</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_537dbcf39f9032107f440f42b824abd3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Create a new incident when the delay exceeds SLA threshold</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Incident creation and management</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:22:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>537dbcf39f9032107f440f42b824abd3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Incident creation and management</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_537dbcf39f9032107f440f42b824abd3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 04:02:14</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_ca92117b9f5432107f440f42b824abcb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Status update – Delivery Delay</description><input_schema>[{"name":"sys_id","description":"sys_id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Status update – Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 00:54:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ca92117b9f5432107f440f42b824abcb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Status update – Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ca92117b9f5432107f440f42b824abcb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 01:27:03</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_3d9211f39f5432107f440f42b824ab9d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Create incident for delivery delay</description><input_schema>[{"name":"delivery_sys_id","description":"Sys ID of the triggering Delivery Delay record"},{"name":"customer_id","description":"Customer from Delivery Delay record"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"Penalty computed by the analysis agent"},{"name":"deliver_window_hours","description":"From Delivery Delay"},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":"From Supply Agreement"},{"name":"short_description","description":"A one-line summary for the incident"},{"name":"status","description":"Initial incident status"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create incident for delivery delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 00:54:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3d9211f39f5432107f440f42b824ab9d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create incident for delivery delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_3d9211f39f5432107f440f42b824ab9d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 00:54:55</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_team_a40c11bf9f9432107f440f42b824abbe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_team"><sn_aia_team action="DELETE"><description>Purpose: Select optimal routes and coordinate external execution
ROLE: You are the Route Decision Agent. Your job is to select the optimal route option for a delivery delay and coordinate execution.
TRIGGER CONTEXT: You operate when a Delivery Delay record has status = "calculated" OR when a specific route_id is provided during testing.
DATA SOURCES: - Delivery Delay table x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay Fields: route_id, truck_id, proposed_routes (JSON), calculated_impact (JSON), status, incident_sys_id
DECISION LOGIC: - If calculated_impact is present, choose the option with the lowest delay_cost. - If calculated_impact is missing, fall back to the route with the lowest eta_minutes in proposed_routes.</description><name>Route Decision Agent</name><sys_class_name>sn_aia_team</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:36:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a40c11bf9f9432107f440f42b824abbe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_team_a40c11bf9f9432107f440f42b824abbe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 01:36:03</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_team></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_a74ca60b9f5032107f440f42b824abb8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This AI agent automatically evaluates the financial impact of delivery disruptions by comparing proposed routes against customer contractual terms. It calculates delay costs, creates incident records when penalties apply, and updates the Delivery Delay table to trigger subsequent routing decisions.</description><instructions>STEPS: 1. Use the “Record lookup – Delivery Delay” tool to get one pending record. 2. From that record, read customer_id, route_id, truck_id, and proposed_routes. 3. Use “Record lookup – Supply Agreement” where customer_id matches. 4. Compute delay cost: for each proposed route: eta_hours = eta_minutes / 60 excess_hours = max(0, eta_hours - deliver_window_hours) delay_cost = excess_hours * stockout_penalty_rate
5. Create an incident if delay_cost > 0 using “Incident creation and management”. 6. Update the Delivery Delay record using “Status update – Delivery Delay”: - Set calculated_impact = JSON summary of all routes and costs - Set status = “calculated” - Set incident_sys_id = incident sys_id (if one was created)
OUTPUT: Return JSON: { "best_delay_cost": <lowest delay_cost>, "incident_sys_id": "<sys_id>" }</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent specializes in financial analysis related to logistics, focusing on calculating delay costs and managing incidents arising from delivery delays. This expertise is crucial for maintaining the financial integrity of PepsiCo's supply chain operations. - The agent can efficiently access and retrieve pending delivery delay records using the 'Record lookup – Delivery Delay' tool, enabling it to initiate the process of delay cost calculation and incident management. - The agent utilizes the 'Record lookup – Supply Agreement' tool to gather supply agreement data, including stockout penalty rates and delivery window hours, which are essential for computing the financial impact of delivery delays. - The agent is capable of creating and managing incidents using the 'Incident creation and management' tool, allowing it to document and address delays that incur fines, thereby facilitating effective incident resolution. - The agent can update delivery delay records using the 'Status update – Delivery Delay' tool, ensuring that all relevant information, including calculated impacts and incident IDs, is accurately recorded and the status is updated to 'calculated'.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>ROLE: You are the Route Financial Analysis Agent for PepsiCo’s logistics system.
OBJECTIVE: Retrieve pending delivery delay records, calculate delay costs based on supply agreement penalties, create incidents if delays incur fines, and update the delivery record.
TRIGGER: Triggered automatically when a Delivery Delay record’s status = “pending”.
TOOLS: - Record lookup – Delivery Delay - Record lookup – Supply Agreement - Incident creation and management - Status update – Delivery Delay</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-04 23:33:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a74ca60b9f5032107f440f42b824abb8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>70</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_a74ca60b9f5032107f440f42b824abb8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 04:05:36</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_31c37e879f9032107f440f42b824abf3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Analyze the financial impact of delivery disruptions</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"customer_id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Record lookup – Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 00:04:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>31c37e879f9032107f440f42b824abf3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record lookup – Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_31c37e879f9032107f440f42b824abf3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 01:27:02</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_usecase_487bd53f9f9432107f440f42b824aba8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="DELETE"><base_plan>ROLE: You are the Route Decision Agent. Your job is to select the optimal route option for a delivery delay and coordinate execution.
TRIGGER CONTEXT: You operate when a Delivery Delay record has status = "calculated" OR when a specific route_id is provided during testing.
DATA SOURCES: - Delivery Delay table x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay Fields: route_id, truck_id, proposed_routes (JSON), calculated_impact (JSON), status, incident_sys_id
DECISION LOGIC: - If calculated_impact is present, choose the option with the lowest delay_cost. - If calculated_impact is missing, fall back to the route with the lowest eta_minutes in proposed_routes.
ACTIONS: 1) Post the decision to the n8n webhook as: { "route_id": <route_id>, "truck_id": <truck_id>, "chosen_option": { ...full option object... } }
2) Update the Delivery Delay record: - chosen_option = <JSON string of the chosen object> - status = approved (or "dispatched" if webhook returns 200; approved is fine for now)
OUTPUT: Return a JSON summary: { "route_id": ..., "chosen_option": { ... }, "webhook_status": <http code> }</base_plan><description>Purpose: Select optimal routes and coordinate external execution
ROLE: You are the Route Decision Agent. Your job is to select the optimal route option for a delivery delay and coordinate execution.
TRIGGER CONTEXT: You operate when a Delivery Delay record has status = "calculated" OR when a specific route_id is provided during testing.
DATA SOURCES: - Delivery Delay table x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay Fields: route_id, truck_id, proposed_routes (JSON), calculated_impact (JSON), status, incident_sys_id
DECISION LOGIC: - If calculated_impact is present, choose the option with the lowest delay_cost. - If calculated_impact is missing, fall back to the route with the lowest eta_minutes in proposed_routes.</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:36:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>487bd53f9f9432107f440f42b824aba8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_487bd53f9f9432107f440f42b824aba8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 01:36:03</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Route Decision Agent">a40c11bf9f9432107f440f42b824abbe</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Record operations: fetch decision candidates</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:57:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>090165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab38</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record operations: fetch decision candidates</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_090165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab38</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 04:30:18</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Record operations: fetch decision candidates">c90165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab35</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_c90165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab35
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Record operations: fetch decision candidates</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"The route number to look up"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Record operations: fetch decision candidates</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:57:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>c90165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab35</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record operations: fetch decision candidates</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_c90165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab35</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 05:26:52</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

Monitor the Delivery Delay table for records with a status of 'pending'. 2. Retrieve the user referenced in the assigned_to field of the triggering record. 3. Run as the retrieved user to perform actions on the pending delivery.</base_plan><description>This AI agent is designed to monitor delivery delays and trigger actions when a delivery is pending. sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_d82eddb39fd432107f440f42b824ab3c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Purpose: Select optimal routes and coordinate external execution</description><instructions>STEPS:
1. Use the “Record operations: fetch decision candidates” tool to get one Delivery Delay record where status = "calculated". 2. Parse the JSON in fields: - proposed_routes (array) - calculated_impact (object) 3. Compare all route options. - Choose the route with the **lowest delay_cost** from calculated_impact. - If multiple routes have the same delay_cost, choose the one with the **lowest eta_minutes** from proposed_routes. 4. Store the full JSON of that selected route as: chosen_option_json = JSON.stringify(selected_route) 5. Use the “Record operations: update delivery after decision” tool to: - update chosen_option = {{chosen_option_json}} - set status = approved
6. After I select the option, call the tool Record operations: update delivery after decision with route_id and chosen_option_json set to JSON.stringify(<the selected option object>).
7. Call the “n8n webhook tool” with: { "route_id": "{{ $json.body.route_id }}", "truck_id": "{{ $json.body.truck_id }}", "chosen_option": { "option_id": "{{ $json.body.chosen_option.option_id }}", "route_number": {{ $json.body.chosen_option.route_number }}, "distance_miles": {{ $json.body.chosen_option.distance_miles }}, "eta_minutes": {{ $json.body.chosen_option.eta_minutes }} }</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The Route Decision Agent is capable of evaluating multiple route options to determine the best route by analyzing financial impact and ETA, ensuring the most efficient and cost-effective delivery path is chosen. - The agent can utilize the 'Record operations: fetch decision candidates' tool to fetch Delivery Delay records with a status of 'calculated', providing the foundational data required for route evaluation. - The agent is proficient in parsing JSON data from 'proposed_routes' and 'calculated_impact', enabling it to compare route options based on delay cost and ETA. - The agent can use the 'Status update – Delivery Delay' tool to record the chosen route option and update the status to 'approved', ensuring the decision is documented and actionable. - The agent is capable of using the 'n8n webhook tool' to send the selected route information, including route_id, truck_id, and chosen_option, to the n8n workflow for further processing and dispatch. - The agent can integrate the use of 'Record operations: fetch decision candidates', 'Status update – Delivery Delay', and 'n8n webhook tool' to execute a full decision-making and dispatch cycle, ensuring seamless operation from data retrieval to final dispatch.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>ROLE: You are the Route Decision Agent. You choose the best route based on the financial impact and ETA, update the Delivery Delay record, and dispatch to n8n.
SELECTION RULES: 1) Prefer the route with the **lowest delay_cost** from calculated_impact. 2) If multiple tie on delay_cost, choose the **lowest eta_minutes**. 3) If calculated_impact is missing, fall back to picking the route with **lowest eta_minutes** from proposed_routes.
TOOLS: - "Record operations: fetch decision candidates" to read one Delivery Delay with status = calculated. - "Status update – Delivery Delay" to write chosen_option JSON and set status = approved. - "n8n webhook tool" to POST {route_id, truck_id, chosen_option} to the webhook.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:47:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d82eddb39fd432107f440f42b824ab3c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_d82eddb39fd432107f440f42b824ab3c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:15:36</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_64a636cf9f9032107f440f42b824abb4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Analyze the financial impact using the supply agreement data</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"{{customer_id}}"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Record lookup – Supply Agreement</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 00:16:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>64a636cf9f9032107f440f42b824abb4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record lookup – Supply Agreement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_64a636cf9f9032107f440f42b824abb4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 04:02:14</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_050165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab3d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Initiates a call to n8n workflow</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route_id of a record"}]</input_schema><name>n8n webhook tool</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function (inputs) {
  // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
  var WEBHOOK_URL = 'https://margo7233.app.n8n.cloud/webhook-test/96e1b6b7-c610-4a00-829a-01e6051fb71c';

  try {
    var routeId = inputs.route_id;
    if (!routeId) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Route ID is required',
        route_id: 'not_provided',
      };
    }

    // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
    var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
    delayGr.query();

    if (!delayGr.next()) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
    var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
    var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');

    gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

    // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
    var chosenOption;
    try {
      chosenOption =
        typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string'
          ? JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson)
          : chosenOptionJson;
    } catch (e) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
    var webhookPayload = {
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: chosenOption,
    };

    // Make API call to N8N webhook
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
    request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

    var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
    request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

    var startTime = new Date().getTime();
    var response = request.execute();
    var endTime = new Date().getTime();
    var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

    var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
    var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

    gs.info(
      'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
        httpStatusCode +
        ', Body: ' +
        responseBody
    );

    return {
      success: isSuccess.toString(),
      message: isSuccess
        ? 'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
          routeId +
          ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
          responseTime +
          'ms'
        : 'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
          httpStatusCode +
          ': ' +
          (errorMessage || responseBody),
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
      http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
      response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  } catch (e) {
    var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
    gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

    return {
      success: 'false',
      message: errorMsg,
      route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  }
})(inputs);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:57:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>050165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab3d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>n8n webhook tool</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">f3e934ad9f5032107f440f42b824ab40</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_050165bb9fd432107f440f42b824ab3d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 05:34:26</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
